name: Iron Pickaxe
description:
## Iron Pickaxe

A tool used to mine gold. It is burnt after use.

You can craft an iron pickaxe at the Blacksmith in the game.

## Supply

Unlimited

### Crafting Costs

---

- 5 SFL
- 5 Wood
- 3 Iron

[Link](https://docs.sunflower-land.com/player-guides/resource-gathering#tools)
